property.name: userLevelDocumentation
property.configure: Produce a random sequence with a triangular distribution. On each iteration, a new random number is produced. The output port is of type double. The values that are generated are independent and identically distributed with mode and bounds as defined by the parameters. In addition, the seed can be specified as a parameter to control the sequence that is generated.

property.name: port:max
property.configure: The maximum value. This parameter contains a DoubleToken, initially with value 1.0.

property.name: port:output
property.configure: The output port. The type of this port is unspecified. Derived classes may set it.

property.name: port:trigger
property.configure: The trigger port. The type of this port is undeclared, meaning that it will resolve to any data type.

property.name: port:min
property.configure: The minimum value. This parameter contains a DoubleToken, initially with value 0.0.

property.name: port:mode
property.configure: The mode of the distribution (peak of triangle). This parameter contains a DoubleToken, initially with value 0.5.

property.name: prop:max
property.configure: The maximum value. This parameter contains a DoubleToken, initially with value 1.0.

property.name: prop:seed
property.configure: The seed that controls the random number generation. This is a shared parameter, meaning that all instances of RandomSource or derived classes in the same model share the same value. A seed of zero is interpreted to mean that no seed is specified, which means that each execution of the model could result in distinct data. For the value 0, the seed is set to System.currentTimeMillis() + hashCode(), which means that with extremely high probability, two distinct actors will have distinct seeds. However, current time may not have enough resolution to ensure that two subsequent executions of the same model have distinct seeds. For a value other than zero, the seed is set to that value plus the hashCode() of the full name of the actor. This means that with high probability, two distinct actors will have distinct, but repeatable seeds. This parameter contains a LongToken, initially with value 0.

property.name: prop:privateSeed
property.configure: This private seed overrides the shared seed parameter to specify a particular seed rather than using System.currentTimeMillis() or hashCode() to compute the seed value. By default, this parameter is empty, which means that the shared seed parameter is used. WARNING: It is up to the user to make sure that different seed values are used in different random number generators.

property.name: prop:min
property.configure: The minimum value. This parameter contains a DoubleToken, initially with value 0.0.

property.name: prop:resetOnEachRun
property.configure: If true, this parameter specifies that the random number generator should be reset on each run of the model (in the initialize() method). It is a boolean that defaults to false. This is a shared parameter, meaning that changing it somewhere in the model causes it to be changed everywhere in the model.

property.name: prop:mode
property.configure: The mode of the distribution (peak of triangle). This parameter contains a DoubleToken, initially with value 0.5.
